front.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Surge Protectors Used in Low-Voltage (Less Than Or Equal To 1000 Vrms or 1200 Vdc) Data, Communications, and Signaling Circuits

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C62.43-2005 Abstract: Assistance is provided for the selection of the most appropriate type of low-voltage data,communications, and/or signalling circuit surge protector for a particular application or set ofconditions. Surge protector functions and characteristics are also explained and evaluated. ACpower circuit applications are not addressed in this document.
